rows.label: qev060201_MSG0001
rows.name: Pardon me, but I have a question. *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060201_MSG0002
rows.name:
I have heard that the BLADEs are split among a number
of different divisions.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060201_MSG0003
rows.name:
So then, if I needed help searching for someone,
which division would be best to ask? *fsssh*
The missing are not human, if that matters.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060201_JNK0010
rows.name: Suggest Mediators

rows.label: qev060201_SEL0011
rows.name:
Tell Horonalderon that the Mediators
handle alien-related problems.

rows.label: qev060201_JNK0020
rows.name: Suggest Pathfinders

rows.label: qev060201_SEL0021
rows.name:
Tell Horonalderon that FrontierNav
searches are a Pathfinder specialty.

rows.label: qev060201_MSG0004
rows.name:
The Mediators? I see. With their experience in resolving
conflicts across racial lines, they should be more than
qualified. *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060201_MSG0005
rows.name:
So those data probes you humans have placed all over
Mira can be used to locate people as well? *fsssh*
That must be very convenient...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060201_MSG0006
rows.name:
Thank you. You sound quite knowledgeable. *fsssh*
Might you be a BLADE operative yourself?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060201_MSG0007
rows.name:
*fsssh* If you wouldn't mind, could I have a moment
more of your time?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060201_MSG0008
rows.name:
I'm looking for a trailer that headed out into Primordia
to dig up voltant. *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060201_MSG0009
rows.name:
Another Zaruboggan named Phoskeran was driving it.
He is...young. *fsssh* A little airheaded, to be honest.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060201_MSG0010
rows.name:
This is his first expedition, so I told him to check in
periodically with status reports, but I have not heard
a thing. *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060201_MSG0011
rows.name:
I assume he is fine, but accidents do happen. *fsssh*
Is there any way I could convince you to check on him?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060201_MSG0012
rows.name:
Thank you. *fsssh* The success of this expedition could
have a large influence on our voltant stores.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060201_MSG0013
rows.name:
As such, this is about more than just Phoskeran's safety.
It actually affects all Zaruboggan. *fsssh*
So I am quite grateful for your help.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060201_MSG0014
rows.name:
Phoskeran's excavation site was the Northpointe
Beach in Primordia. I suggest starting your
search there. *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060201_MSG0015
rows.name:
Phoskeran is unusual among Zaruboggan in that he
is...well...unusual. Unique, let us say. *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060201_MSG0016
rows.name:
But this expedition demanded flexibility and a new
perspective, so we chose him to send out into
Primordia.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060201_MSG0017
rows.name:
*fsssh* I hope he is fine and just being a young fool.
In any case, thank you for checking up on him.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060201_MSG0018
rows.name: Phoskeran! *fsssh* What happened to the trailer?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060201_MSG0019
rows.name:
You had been filling it with all the voltant you dug up,
correct? So whereâ€”[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060201_MSG0020
rows.name:
Horonalderon! *fsssh* Are you familiar with the
human rhetorical device called a "metaphor"?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060201_MSG0021
rows.name:
Perhaps you would like to hear a metaphor that
expresses my current situation? *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060201_MSG0022
rows.name:
What are you babbling about? *fsssh*
This is no time for such nonsense![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060201_MSG0023
rows.name:
I am terribly sorry to have involved you in such a
disaster. *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060201_MSG0024
rows.name:
But please, you must help us. *fsssh*
The people of this city have been so welcoming to us.
We cannot let them suffer for our mistake.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060201_MSG0025
rows.name:
Well, [ST:playername ]? How did it go?
*fsssh* Did you find any clues about the culprit?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060201_MSG0026
rows.name: *fsssh* Ah! This is the stolen voltant![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060201_MSG0027
rows.name:
...You were able to talk them into giving it back?
Astonishing! *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060201_MSG0028
rows.name:
Now then, Phoskeran. ...Phoskeran! *fsssh*
Make sure you thank this nice BLADE here.
...Actually, you should probably apologize first.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060201_MSG0029
rows.name:
Apologize... Apolo... Oh, right! That is the one where
you hang your head at about 45 degrees and chant
"I'm sorry," yes? *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060201_JNK0030
rows.name: Confirm

rows.label: qev060201_SEL0031
rows.name: Nod and get this over with.

rows.label: qev060201_JNK0040
rows.name: Correct

rows.label: qev060201_SEL0041
rows.name: Explain to Phoskeran what a proper apology is.

rows.label: qev060201_MSG0043
rows.name:
Right then. I'm sorry, I'm sorry, I'm sorry, thank you.
*fsssh* ...So very sorry.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060201_MSG0030
rows.name:
*yaaawn* Well, I am incredibly sleepy now.
You would make an excellent hypnotist. *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060201_MSG0031
rows.name:
I apologize, good BLADE. *fsssh*
Encouraging him to speak was my mistake.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060201_MSG0032
rows.name:
This is a sign of my gratitude, for saving this city and
the Zaruboggan both. Thank you! *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060201_MSG0033
rows.name:
Well, [ST:playername ]? How did it go?
Did you find any clues about the culprit? *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060201_MSG0034
rows.name:
...And Phoskeran was settling down for a nap?
...So the culprit THREW the voltant? *fsssh*
Then Phoskeran devoltanized the lot of it?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060201_MSG0035
rows.name: *fssssssssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060201_MSG0036
rows.name:
I had never known what purpose Golbogga could
possibly have had for someone like him, but for a
brief second there, I felt I finally understood.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060201_MSG0037
rows.name:
He has an almost miraculous apathy. *fsssh*
The sort of laziness which is able to overpower even
the direst of threats.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060201_JNK0050
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: qev060201_SEL0051
rows.name: Nod and say that Horonalderon may be right.

rows.label: qev060201_JNK0060
rows.name: Disagree

rows.label: qev060201_SEL0061
rows.name: Adamantly deny Horonalderon's assertion.

rows.label: qev060201_MSG0038
rows.name:
Perhaps I need to learn to be more like him.
...Never thought I would say that. *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060201_MSG0039
rows.name:
R-right. Right! Of course. *fsssh*
I was almost sucked into his world there.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060201_MSG0040
rows.name:
I'm glad I had someone reasonable nearby to pull me
back from the abyss. *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060201_MSG0041
rows.name:
In any case, thank you. *fsssh* I am relieved this was
resolved without causing any trouble for the city.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060201_MSG0042
rows.name:
This is a sign of my gratitude, for saving this city and
Zaruboggan both. *fsssh* Thank you, brave BLADE![ST:wait ]
